column4: can somebody please paste the results of route from their box?
i can ping the LAN but i can't get on the net. =(
does your network use dhcp?
nope. static.
have you got your dns set up properly?
everything is set in /etc/network/interfaces
yes. i can ping the dns server from the other box, but not from this box.
not necessarily. try, 'ping 64.233.167.99'
nope. doesn't work.
what error are you getting?
22 packets transmitted, 0 received, 100% packet loss, time 21010ms
er, I meant before that. ping should give off an error for each packet.
i can't ping beyond the NAT.
nope. just blank
then you've a problem with your gateway
hmmm... shouldn't be. box that's running irssi is behind the same gateway.
can you ping that box?
yep, i can.
can you access that box? reissue the ping I gave before there.
sorry, no ping there.
no ping?
i can ping from another box behind the gateway though. it works fine.
i can't ping using the gateway. it's an off the shelf NAT.
there's this weird line in the routing tables though --> link-local      *               255.255.0.0     U     1000   0        0 eth0
